title: Human Review with AWS Lambda durable functions
description: Pause AI workflow for human approval before continuing using AWS Lambda durable functions

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates human-in-the-loop workflows with AWS Lambda durable functions. The workflow suspends execution while awaiting human review without consuming compute resources.
The example extracts fields from a document using an LLM, then waits for human approval before proceeding.
Benefits: Pay only for active compute time, not wait periods. Workflows can suspend for up to one year. No infrastructure to manage while waiting for human input.
